rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area that aligns with Vastu principles, ensuring a positive flow of energy. It includes a small foyer and an open waiting space.

Spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, decorated in Bohemian style with vibrant textiles and eclectic art. Vastu-compliant seating arrangement promoting social interaction.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the living area, designed with a large table and comfortable seating. The layout encourages family gatherings while aligning with local building norms.
Modern kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art amenities and ample storage. Incorporates Vastu guidelines for energy flow and safety in the culinary space.
Small room dedicated to laundry, storage, and other utilities. Designed for efficient use of space while ensuring privacy.
Main bathroom with proper ventilation and water-saving fixtures, designed following Vastu principles for health and balance.

description.features: En-suite bathroom, floor-to-ceiling windows offering scenic views, a comfortable Bohemian-inspired decor, and privacy ensured by Vastu layout.
Two additional bedrooms with functional layouts optimized for guests. Each room includes natural light from large windows and maintains traditional Indian comfort along with modern touches.

Used to connect indoor and outdoor living spaces, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that allow seamless integration with the garden.

rooms.description: Expansive open space with a mix of seating areas, greenery, and decorative elements in line with Bohemian design. The terrace includes floor-to-ceiling windows along the perimeter for panoramic views while observing Vastu principles.
